Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common.io

Class ArraySwapOutputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
nl.naturalis.common.io.SwapOutputStream
nl.naturalis.common.io.ArraySwapOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeflatedArraySwapOutputStream
public class ArraySwapOutputStream
extends SwapOutputStream
A SwapOutputStream that uses a byte array as internal buffer.
Author:
Ayco Holleman

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ArraySwapOutputStream​(File swapFile)
    See SwapOutputStream(File).
    ArraySwapOutputStream​(File swapFile, int bufSize)
    See SwapOutputStream(File, int).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()
    If the ArraySwapOutputStream has started writing to the swap file, any remaining bytes in the internal buffer will be flushed to it and the output stream to the swap file will be closed.
    void flush()
    If a swap file had to be created and no recall has taken place yet, this method flushes the output stream to the swap file.
    void forceFlush()
    For the non-java.nio implementations of SwapOutputStream this method behaves exactly like SwapOutputStream.flush().
    boolean hasSwapped()
    See SwapOutputStream.hasSwapped().
    static ArraySwapOutputStream newInstance()
    Creates a new instance that swaps to an auto-generated temp file.
    static ArraySwapOutputStream newInstance​(int bufSize)
    Creates a new instance that swaps to an auto-generated temp file.
    void recall​(OutputStream target)
    See SwapOutputStream.recall(OutputStream).
    void write​(byte[] b, int off, int len)
    Writes len bytes from the specified byte array starting at offset off to this output stream.
    void write​(int b)
    Writes the specified byte to this output stream.

  • Method Details

    • newInstance

      public static ArraySwapOutputStream newInstance()
      Creates a new instance that swaps to an auto-generated temp file.
      Returns:
      A FileSwapOutputStream that swaps to an auto-generated temp file

    • newInstance

      public static ArraySwapOutputStream newInstance​(int bufSize)
      Creates a new instance that swaps to an auto-generated temp file. The size of the internal buffer is specified through the bufSize parameter.
      Parameters:
      bufSize - The size in bytes of the internal buffer
      Returns:
      A FileSwapOutputStream that swaps to an auto-generated temp file

    • flush

      public void flush() throws IOException
      Description copied from class: SwapOutputStream
      If a swap file had to be created and no recall has taken place yet, this method flushes the output stream to the swap file. After the data has been recalled this method flushes the output stream passed in through the recall method. The java.nio implementations of SwapOutputStream will not call force on the FileChannel writing to the swap file. Call SwapOutputStream.forceFlush() if necessary.
      Specified by:
      flush in interface Flushable
      Specified by:
      flush in class SwapOutputStream
      Throws:
      IOException

    • forceFlush

      public void forceFlush() throws IOException
      Description copied from class: SwapOutputStream
      For the non-java.nio implementations of SwapOutputStream this method behaves exactly like SwapOutputStream.flush(). For the java.nio implementations of SwapOutputStream this method will call ileChannel#force(boolean) force(false)} on the FileChannel writing to the swap file.
      Specified by:
      forceFlush in class SwapOutputStream
      Throws:
      IOException

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      If the ArraySwapOutputStream has started writing to the swap file, any remaining bytes in the internal buffer will be flushed to it and the output stream to the swap file will be closed. Otherwise this method does nothing. Any remaining bytes in the internal buffer will just stay there.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable
      Specified by:
      close in class SwapOutputStream
      Throws:
      IOException

    • hasSwapped

      See SwapOutputStream.hasSwapped().
      Specified by:
      hasSwapped in class SwapOutputStream

      public void recall​(OutputStream target) throws IOException
      See SwapOutputStream.recall(OutputStream).
      Specified by:
      recall in class SwapOutputStream
      Parameters:
      target - The output stream to which to write the data
      Throws:
      IOException - If you call this method more than once or if an I/O error occurs
